stimulusHtml:
A model showing the cells in anaphase I and anaphase II of meiosis during a nondisjunction event is shown in Figure 1.

Figure 1. Model of a nondisjunction event

Which of the following best predicts the effect of the chromosomal segregation error shown in Figure 1?
choicesHtml: All of the resulting gametes will have an extra chromosome.
All of the resulting gametes will be missing a chromosome.
Half of the resulting gametes will have an extra chromosome and the other half will be missing a chromosome.
Half of the resulting gametes will have the correct number of chromosomes, and the other half will have an incorrect number of chromosomes.
